metadata.title: CVE-2022-3857 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libpng 1.6.38. A crafted PNG image can lead to asegmentation fault and denial of service in png_setup_paeth_row() function.

criterions.comment: libpng1.6 package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
